definition: and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
to offer sacrifices to one's ancestors
Song Zuying (1966-), Chinese folk music singer
primogenitor/founder of a school or trade
Matsu, name of a sea goddess still widely worshipped on the SE China coast and in SE Asia
Matsu Islands off Fujian, administered by Taiwan
Joey Yung (1980-), Hong Kong pop singer and actress
the earliest ancestor/originator (of a tradition, school of thought etc)
passed on from ancestors/handed down from generation to generation

sentences.english: The Lunar New Year, my family would be my grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 在夏历新年，我的家庭都将我的祖怙恃。

sentences.english: It is the copper made fresco of 41 meters long behind the statue of Zhang of the Ancestral Celestial Master Palace.
sentences.chinese: 在祖天师殿天师像背后，是长达41米的天师铜壁画。

sentences.english: Zubari published an apology in Yediot on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 周二，祖巴里在《以色列日报》上刊登了道歉声明。

sentences.english: Mr. Zupan said he might sell it if he needed the money.
sentences.chinese: 祖彭先生说如果实在是需要钱他会将车出售。

sentences.english: Remember Jaydon's birthday story last year?
sentences.chinese: 还记得祖去年的生日故事吗？

sentences.english: I asked Jaydon to take over the phone, we started arranging for everything, air tickets and so on.
sentences.chinese: 我叫祖听电话，我们开始一切联络，安排机票等等。

sentences.english: LiuZu Ren use two department officials forced XuanZu to give up the idea of free base.
sentences.chinese: 柳祖讱动用两司官员逼迫宣祖放弃免贱的想法。

sentences.english: The Zul'Dare region of Lordaeron is invaded.
sentences.chinese: 在洛伦丹的祖德尔地区被侵略。

sentences.english: Who was Jaydon directing those words at?
sentences.chinese: 祖的那句话是对谁说的？

sentences.english: For the Lord's hand was with him.
sentences.chinese: 主神要把他祖大卫的位给他。

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism was praised highly during the period of Emperor Chengzu in Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 明代自成祖开始崇好藏传佛教，宦官也因之深受影响。

sentences.english: At the time of publication, Jim Jubak did not own or control shares of any company mentioned in this column.
sentences.chinese: 本文发表时，祖巴克没有持控文中提及的任何股票。

sentences.english: LiuZu Ren hope light must accept the sea king Song Yingchang kindness.
sentences.chinese: 柳祖讱希望光海君一定要接受宋应昌的好意。

sentences.english: "Drew, " I scolded, "no one can understand a word you're saying.
sentences.chinese: “祖，”我责备道，“没人明白你在说什么。”

sentences.english: It’s a beautiful Friday, and Zuccotti Park looks… different.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个美丽的星期五，祖科蒂公园显得有些不同。

sentences.english: Yoo sung-ryong and LiuZu Ren fierce dispute happened.
sentences.chinese: 柳成龙与柳祖讱发生了激烈的争执。

definition: primogenitor/founder of a school or trade
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
Shengzu, temple name of the second Qing emperor, known as the Kangxi Emperor (1654-1722)/cf. 康熙[Kang1 xi1]
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
to spread out/to develop/to overflow/to amplify/superfluous
direct line of descent/under one's personal command/school or faction passing on faithfully one's doctrine
